mapper.select: select VACATION_INDEX, VACATION_EMP_INDEX, VACATION_DATE, VACATION_CONTENTS, ATTEND_TYPE_NAME, EMP_VACATION from VACATION , EMP, ATTEND_TYPE WHERE VACATION_EMP_INDEX = EMP_INDEX AND VACATION_ATTEND_INFO_INDEX = ATTEND_TYPE_INDEX AND VACATION_EMP_INDEX=#{userid}
SELECT EMP_VACATION FROM EMP WHERE EMP_INDEX=#{userid}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET EMP_VACATION = EMP_VACATION +#{COUNT} WHERE EMP_ID = #{EMP_ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM VACATION WHERE VACATION_DATE= #{VACATION_DATE} and VACATION_EMP_INDEX = #{VACATION_EMP_INDEX}
DELETE FROM ATTEND WHERE ATTEND_DATE= #{VACATION_DATE} and ATTEND_EMP_INDEX = #{VACATION_EMP_INDEX}
